channel.title: K Means on 雜
channel.description: Recent content in K Means on 雜

item.title: Ski Resort Clusterring near Montreal
item.description: Rational My 3rd ski season in montérégie is coming, and this post uses a very basic machine-learning-unsupervised-clusterring algorithm to show an interesting analysis about how to choose your next ski journey. Algorithm Quote from wiki page k-means clustering is a method of vector quantization, originally from signal processing, that is popular for cluster analysis in data mining. k-means clustering aims to partition n observations into k clusters in which each observation belongs to the cluster with the nearest mean, serving as a prototype of the cluster.
